price: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi bagezweho n’ibyiza byacu mbere, abo bazaba bari kure y’umuriro.[1]
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ
footnotes: [1] Uyu murongo wahishuwe usubiza amagambo umwe mu babangikanyamana b’i Maka witwaga Ibun Zibaara yavuze agira ati “Niba amagambo Muhamadi avuga y’uko twe n’ibyo tugaragira tuzajya mu muriro, ubwo n’abamalayika bazawujyamo kuko na bo tubasenga, na Uzayiru awujyemo kuko Abayahudi bamusenga, ndetse na Yesu awujyemo kuko Abanaswara bamusenga.”

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
